page.title: 09A typical Day
page.content: Nearly every day of my life,when I am on holiday at home , I get up and go into the bathroom and get washed and dressed. Then dad and I have breakfast and then we go to groom my pony and take him down to his field. When we come back we get our swimming costumes and then we go to the pool at Christchurch. Bathing lasts an hour.We return for lunch at about twelve thirty.After lunch I go to play on the swings by the stream.Later I help mum in the garden.At four o'clock we walk down to fetch the pony and on the way we feed the chickens at grandads. Then I watch television until eight thirty and then I go to bed.
